title: Monos Makes Moves to Los Angeles With First West Coast Location on Abbot Kinney Boulevard
summary: The Venice, Calif. location opened doors on Friday following a VIP sneak peek: “Los Angeles embodies so much of what Monos stands for — creativity, cultural diversity and a deep connection to global travel.”

title: The Best Men’s Jeans for Fall, from Classic Fits to Japanese Denim
summary: Whether you're seeking selvage styles or classic silhouettes, check out our top picks from Levi's, Todd Snyder, Taylor Stitch, Citizens of Humanity and other premium brands.

title: John Christopher Jones, Stage Actor Who Kept Going Despite Parkinson’s, Dies at 77
summary: His Broadway credits included ‘Hurlyburly,’ ‘The Iceman Cometh,’ ‘Beauty and the Beast,’ ‘The Goodbye Girl,’ ‘Otherwise Engaged’ and ‘Heartbreak House.’
